Articles.Content: If a Kerbal is upgraded to full five stars in career mode, he should have the option to be upgraded to orange suit.
YES! It should cost like 1000 funds too!
and then it could not die! P.S im seing you everywhere kaboom!

> 
> YES! It should cost like 1000 funds too!

If hire costs are any indication, you're going to need to add a few more zeros.

> 
> If hire costs are any indication, you're going to need to add a few more zeros.

This. 1000 funds is *nothing.*

I do think that the orange suits should be limited to the Original Four, although maybe you could change the color of their helmets?

> 
> I do think that the orange suits should be limited to the Original Four, although maybe you could change the color of their helmets?

I Agree. The original four should be the only ones with orange IMO. The multicolored helmets are also a lot more technically feasible, as you would only have to swap out the helmet model instead of the entire kerbal. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

i wish the four had their EVA suits orange too. it would make it easier to recognize them.
What about having the suit have text that says: Trusted KerbalTM

I'll see your suggestions and raise you a "hey, I've got an even better idea!" ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

How about adding a feature in the Astronaut Hotel to customize your astronauts' suit colors....? The game has two suit graphics now; a few more could be added and there could be a feature in the Astronaut Hotel to let the player choose what color each astronaut wears. With the proviso that the Original Three (or Original Four or whichever it is now) remain orange, of course. Jebediah wears orange. Period. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
